title: Celeriac Gratin
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Celeriac Gratin a try. This recipe serves 5 and costs $2.16 per serving. Watching your figure? This gluten free and vegetarian recipe has 696 calories, 16g of protein, and 53g of fat per serving. 68 people were impressed by this recipe. If you have celeriac, potatoes, sea salt and pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 1 hour and 4 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 91%. This score is super. Similar recipes are Celeriac Gratin, Celeriac Gratin, and Celeriac & walnut gratin.
